config.title: Simple Close Button Config
config.list.screens.description: Default entries may be incoherent due to Minecraft's obfuscation. To figure out what the entries are, you can go to %1$s to try to make more sense out of it. To add entries for a screen from a mod, go to the mod's github or wherever they are hosting their sources and locate the java class associated with the screen and write the class's whole directory in the 'Screen' field.
config.option.modEnabled.name: Mod Enabled
config.option.modEnabled.desc: Toggles the entire mod. Idk why you would need this. You could've just not downloaded the mod, but ok. You do you.
config.option.tooltip.name: Tooltip
config.option.tooltip.desc: Toggles the tooltip when hovering over the close button.
config.option.list_screens: Path to the Screen class used by the screen you wish to add a button to.
config.option.list_x: Position of the button on the X axis.
config.option.list_y: Position of the button on the Y axis.
config.option.list_recipeBook: Whether or not the screen the button is being added to has a recipe book, in which case it will need to have more coordinates for when it's open.
config.option.list_bookX: X position for when the recipe book is opened. (disabled if screen does not have a recipe book)
config.option.list_bookY: Y position for when the recipe book is opened. (disabled if screen does not have a recipe book)
config.group.chestInventory.name: Chest Inventory (built in)
config.group.chestInventory.desc: Settings for the close button in the chest inventory and all blocks that use the same GenericContainerScreen file. This is built in due to special properties of the screen's functionality.
config.group.chestInventory.option.toggl: Toggles the close button in the small chest inventory.
Position of the close button on the horizontal axis.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY1: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 1 row.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY2: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 2 rows.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY3: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 3 rows.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY4: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 4 rows.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY5: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 5 rows.
config.group.chestInventory.option.posY6: Position of the close button on the vertical axis when 'GenericContainerScreen' has 6 rows.
